text: Mendeleyevo () is a rural locality (a settlement) and the administrative center of Mendeleyevskoye Rural Settlement, Karagaysky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 3,169 as of 2010. There are 57 streets. == Geography == It is located 11 km SSE from Karagay. == References == Category:Rural localities in Karagaysky District
title: Mendeleyevo, Perm Krai
